rev.comment: I think the link is relevant, please discuss before removing it

Line 110: Line 110:
With the success of the pirate bay, the two main server admins/owners have started work on a video streaming site, named the Video Bay. Similar to YouTube, it would host content for free via an embedded media player similar to the video player on YouTube.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://newteevee.com/2007/05/18/under-the-hood-of-the-pirate-bays-new-video-site/ |title=Under the Hood of The Pirate Bayâs New Video Site Â« NewTeeVee |publisher=Newteevee.com |author=  |date= |accessdate=2008-09-28}}</ref>The VideoBay is still in early beta development and is just "experimental" right now. On 22 September 2008, a website named ThePirateCity.org launched claiming to be the video streaming website from the makers of The Pirate Bay. This was later denied by Peter Sunde of The Pirate Bay who said that it had nothing to do with them and would neither confirm nor deny if they were planning a video streaming website.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.webtvwire.com/is-the-pirate-city-new-tpb-streaming-site-the-pirate-bay-imposters-oh-the-irony/ |title=http://ThePirateCity.org Video Streaming Site? | Irony: The Pirate Bay Gets Pirated |publisher=Webtvwire.com |date= |accessdate=2008-09-28}}</ref>
With the success of the pirate bay, the two main server admins/owners have started work on a video streaming site, named the Video Bay. Similar to YouTube, it would host content for free via an embedded media player similar to the video player on YouTube.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://newteevee.com/2007/05/18/under-the-hood-of-the-pirate-bays-new-video-site/ |title=Under the Hood of The Pirate Bayâs New Video Site Â« NewTeeVee |publisher=Newteevee.com |author=  |date= |accessdate=2008-09-28}}</ref>The VideoBay is still in early beta development and is just "experimental" right now. On 22 September 2008, a website named ThePirateCity.org launched claiming to be the video streaming website from the makers of The Pirate Bay. This was later denied by Peter Sunde of The Pirate Bay who said that it had nothing to do with them and would neither confirm nor deny if they were planning a video streaming website.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.webtvwire.com/is-the-pirate-city-new-tpb-streaming-site-the-pirate-bay-imposters-oh-the-irony/ |title=http://ThePirateCity.org Video Streaming Site? | Irony: The Pirate Bay Gets Pirated |publisher=Webtvwire.com |date= |accessdate=2008-09-28}}</ref>

Suprbay.org is the official forum for thepiratebay and the various sites connected to it. It is where users can request reseeding of a torrent, report malware within torrent files or illegal material on thepiratebay.
+
Suprbay.org<ref>{{cite web|url=http://suprbay.org/index.php}}</ref> is the official forum for thepiratebay and the various sites connected to it. It is where users can request reseeding of a torrent, report malware within torrent files or illegal material on thepiratebay.
